task.title: Highlight Recently Used Characters
task.shortdesc: Highlight recently used characters in the IPA Map.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) within any section of the IPA Map and select Highlight recently used from the context menu.
step.stepresult: The last twenty characters entered with the IPA Map will be highlighted in yellow; the most recently used characters will be the brightest.

step.cmd: To turn off this feature, right-click (CTRL+click) within any section of the IPA Map and deselect Highlight recently used from the context menu.
